reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater soft and comfortable, with one mentioning the tie front adds a cute touch. The material quality receives mixed feedback, with some praising it while others find it feels cheap, and the color accuracy is also mixed, with some liking the color while others say it doesn't match expectations. The fit and size get mixed reviews, with some finding it a great fit while others report it slides down

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such a cute and flattering cardigan
items.body: Cutest cropped cardigan of all time! I love wearing this cardigan with high waisted anything! I feel so cute and it’s flattering! It’s the perfect thickness not too warm or thin. It’s exactly how you’d want a cardigan to feel. I love the color and the feel. I feel adorable when I wear this. Read more
items.author: Kristie Stout

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for maternity pictures
items.body: This blouse/sweater cardigan was perfect for my maternity pictures!! It’s a cute top and very soft. Be careful to only wash it with light colors tho! Read more
items.author: Victoria

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good
items.body: So cute and good material Read more
items.author: Lizbeth Martinez

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm and Cute
items.body: Love this sweater so much. It's slightly cropped, making it perfect to wear over a dress or with high waisted pants. It's definitely a thicker/warmer material, so this is better suited to cooler weather. The tie in the front adds a cute touch. Would buy again in another color. Read more
items.author: Jessica

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Don't buy the cream color
items.body: I got the cream colored sweater and it came light pink. I didn't like the color at all and it didn't go with much so I ended up getting rid of it. It fit well though, wasn't too heavy but still warm, felt fine on my skin, quality wasn't bad, and as a taller girly I was surprised the sleeves were long enough. I just wished the cream sweater came the color it was supposed to be. I would buy again in different color Read more
items.author: Grace

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute Sweater!
items.body: Super cute, purchased for my daughter to wear over her dress for her chorus concert. High quality material, soft and cozy. Perfect thickness, not to heavy. Size as expected. Great value, would purchase again in additional colors if she needed it. Read more
items.author: Shellsnrn82

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Came apart during first wash cycle
items.body: Very cute and soft, however it is already unraveling after the first wash cycle (followed wash directions exactly). Certainly would not have paid $30 for it if I knew it would come apart on the first wash. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sized up. Small chest works. I think if you have a larger chest maybe size up 2
items.body: Sized up. Soft and warm, not too warm. Stylish. The white I ordered in the same kind was NOT the same. 1/2 the size scratchy material. Not worth $5. It's going back. Read more
items.author: Sheila

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Pink and Rose, Dark Grey, Green Solid, Dusty Pink, Black, Dusty Blue, Orange, Red Solid, Royal Blue, Lace White, Light Pink, Light Brown, Maroon, A Khaki. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
